title: The name vvvortic is available
body:
If someone changes their name to vvvortic I will include them in my vvvortic documentary

BTW: You have to be lvl 5 to post on the forums

replies.body:
Thanks for clearing that up for me.

Yeah I was very surprised when they shut down forums right after that. Never would have thought that a small comment such as that would have been the last ever on GD.{{item:3070}} I am not worthy of the honour.
A vvvortic documentary aye? I am clueless as to what that is.

It's this guy who comments on every video that gets to the front page of /r/leagueoflegends. He's been doing it for months

You have the last post on OCE GD btw
